doc.title: An Attempt to Escape
doc.plot: "A young man who has been forbidden the house, climbs up the chimney when the young lady's father approaches. The girl's younger brother suspects his hiding place, and send a sky-rocket up the chimney. The youth comes tumbling down with his clothing torn and his condition generally demoralized. In spite of this, however, the father seizes him by the neck and kicks him into the street."
